entry.summary: dengyao1014: ðŸ‘‹ Hello everyone! I'd like to share a project I've been working on - a web interface for DeepSeek AI models. ðŸ” What is DeepSeekr? It's a platform that provides free access to DeepSeek AI models. No registration required, no API key needed - just open and start chatting. âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Supports both DeepSeek-7B and 67B models â€¢ Completely free to use â€¢ No registration required â€¢ Clean, minimalist interface â€¢ Fast response time ðŸ› Tech Stack: â€¢ Frontend: Next.js â€¢ Backend: Node.js â€¢ AI: DeepSeek API ðŸ”— Website: https://deepseekr1.site ðŸ’¡ Use Cases: â€¢ General conversation and Q&A â€¢ Programming assistance â€¢ Content creation â€¢ Learning and education ðŸŽ¯ Motivation: I noticed many people wanted to try DeepSeek models but were blocked by various barriers. So I developed this simple tool to help more people experience AI technology. ðŸ“ Future Plans: â€¢ Add more useful features â€¢ Optimize response speed â€¢ Support more models â€¢ Expand use case scenarios I welcome any feedback and suggestions. entry.title: Thank You (2024 Edition)
entry.summary: I'm more thankful this time around because, last year, I didn't even get to write this post. But now that I'm back, writing this feels so, so, so good. There's a lot more gusto going into my writing when I say: thank you so very much! Let's tie a bow on this year and round up what happened around here in 2024. Thank You (2024 Edition) originally published on CSS-Tricks, which is part of the DigitalOcean family. You should get the newsletter.
